narrative.narrative: Aerovias DAP is based at Punta Arenas,Chile in the extreme south of South America in the Antarctic division of Chile. It was founded in 1979 and the DAP in its name is the initials of founder Domingo Andres Pivce, a local business man. Its first plane was a Twin Otter 300. It flies in the area of its hub mostly, but offers charters to Argentina and does summer flights to Antarctica. This area of extreme south South America is called Patagonia. Current regular sceduled flights are to Puerto Williams and Porvenir. It has two 737-200 Adv.s which it got in 2013,twi BAe 146-200s which it got the first in 2007, an Avro RJ 85 since 2013,its Twin Otter 300, two Cessna 402C's,two Beechcraft King Airs, and a CASA Aviocar. It has a helicopter subsidiary that that has 11 helicopters and serves the oil,mining and emergency medical industries.

prefereds.aircrafts: BAe 146-200,Boeing 737-200 Adv.,Avro RJ 85,Cessna 402C,C212 Aviocar,DHC-6-300 Twin Otter,Beechcraft King Air B200
